name: market for liquefied petroleum gas | liquefied petroleum gas | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20008/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'liquefied petroleum gas', in the geography of Brazil.;Inventory for regional market of refined petroleum product, encompassing the distribution to the final consumer (household, road vehicle, power plant, etc.) including transport. This regional market activitiy was created as a copy of the corresponding datasets for Switzerland in ecoinvent v3.4 (2017). The type and amount of all exchanges have been left unmodified, but the uncertainty information has been adjusted accordingly.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'liquefied petroleum gas',  within the geography of Brazil.

This activity ends with the supply of 'liquefied petroleum gas',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are considered.
category: C:Manufacturing/19:Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products/192:Manufacture of refined petroleum products/1920:Manufacture of refined petroleum products

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Comment found in the corresponding dataset for Switzerland in ecoinvent v3.4 (2017): This dataset has been extrapolated from year 2008 to the year of the calculation (2017). The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Comment found in the corresponding dataset for Switzerland in ecoinvent v3.4 (2017): statistics, company data
